content: sizes 1/2/3 correspond to a foot circumference of approximately 19/21/23 cm foot length customizable leg height customizable materials fingering weight sock yarn 75% wool 25% polyamide 410-420 m/100 g 3 colors main color mc - white contrast color 1 cc1 - pink contrast color 2 cc2 - green in my version i used alize superwash comfort socks hand-dyed hanks color peony pink and drops fabel color 100 white needles 2 5 mm 80 cm circular needle for magic loop 2 pairs or set for working two socks at once gauge 34 stitches and 34 row = 10x10 cm in stockinette stitch after blocking skill level not for beginners no video tutorial is provided must know knit and purl stitches magic loop method short row stranded colorwork fair isle kitchener stitch description the socks are knitted from the ruffle to the toe the process consists of several parts working the ruffle the roll joining them then the leg the reinforced heel the gusset the foot and the reinforced toe important while knitting monitor the gauge of the floats when working colorwork
